sentences.english: Nazism was not only nationalism run amok.
sentences.chinese: 納粹不僅僅是殺氣騰騰的國家主義。

sentences.english: A masked man ran amok in the town square.
sentences.chinese: 一個戴面具的人殺氣騰騰地闖進了市政廣場。

sentences.english: A few corporate pages have seemed combative.
sentences.chinese: 還有少數幾家公司頁面看起來殺氣騰騰。

sentences.english: I could hear the bloodthirsty Dartmouth fans shouting.
sentences.chinese: 我聽見那些殺氣騰騰的達特默思球迷大聲叫好。
